sentences.english: They then found the same virus lurking in the genome of the three-toed sloth.
sentences.chinese: 然後他們發現同樣的病毒也潛伏在三趾樹懶基因組裏。

sentences.english: He was inspired by fossils of armadillos and sloths.
sentences.chinese: 犰狳和樹懶化石讓他獲得了靈感。

sentences.english: The first find was a humerus, or upper arm bone, of a giant ground sloth.
sentences.chinese: 第一個發現是巨型樹懶的肱骨，或上臂骨。

sentences.english: Sloths are medium-sized mammals that live in Central and South America.
sentences.chinese: 樹懶是一種生活在中南美洲的中等體型哺乳動物。

sentences.english: The thick, dense coats of a sloth help keep them dry during the rainy season.
sentences.chinese: 樹懶厚而緊實的皮膚讓它們在雨季的時候保持乾燥。

sentences.english: Ground sloths are a diverse group of extinct sloths, in the mammalian superorder Xenarthra.
sentences.chinese: 地懶是已經滅絕的樹懶的一個子類，屬哺乳綱貧齒目。

sentences.english: As it is, the sloth mainly eats leaves because they tend not to run away.
sentences.chinese: 就像這樣樹懶基本只吃樹葉因爲樹葉大都不會逃跑。
